reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable, particularly on hot days, and appreciate its flattering design that accentuates curves. Moreover, the dress receives positive feedback for its appearance, fit, and suitability for various occasions, including beach weddings and outdoor summer events. However, opinions about size and fabric quality are mixed - while some find it true to size with good fabric, others report it runs too small and describe the material as like a cheap t-shirt. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: Fit well. Hubby loved it. I’m apple shaped and carry most of my weight in my midsection and this was flattering. Shows off arms, legs, cleavage. Kinda flowy in belly area so very forgiving. Sorry I didn’t get a full length photo, I did feel beautiful on our date though. Definitely worth trying! Read more
items.author: Katherine McKeithen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Summer Perfection in a Dress!
items.body: I fell in love with this CUPSHE maxi the moment I slipped it on! The lightweight fabric is ideal for hot summer days and breezy nights—it feels like wearing a cloud. I chose the white version, and it’s absolutely stunning. I’m planning to wear it to a BBQ and Bands & Brews, styled with brown low sandals, a white and brown Coach purse, and gold earrings for a casual yet polished look. The fit is spot-on! I always wear a medium, and this dress hugged just right—especially flattering for my 34DD bust. The adjustable spaghetti straps and flowy silhouette make it both comfortable and flattering. I’m already eyeing another color because one just isn’t enough! If you’re looking for a breezy, boho-inspired summer dress that’s effortlessly chic, this one’s a winner. Read more
items.author: PinkShoes1116

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute Comfy Dress, Quality Ok
items.body: The media could not be loaded. The dress actually fits pretty well and it’s pretty cute. The length is nowhere near what the photos suggest and is below the knee to maybe mid calf at most. I would have liked it to be longer as advertised but it’s still cute and fits well. The quality isn’t horrible but it definitely could be better with that price. I freshened it up in the dryer for a few minutes to get the wrinkles out and the little fluffy balls on the strings fell right off. It honestly looks better without them, as they look like cheap cat toys. Read more
items.author: Adie whitlow

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very happy hot mess mama about to become a Mrs.!
items.body: I love this dress. It is simple, yet elegant with all of the lace. I feel like it flows gracefully. I like how it is shorter in front with a slip and longer in back. Somehow that makes my 49 year old self feel somewhat sexy, while being classy at the same time. The best part is that it really hides my larger sized midsection. I am 5'5 and 277lbs, and my usual fit is 22/24 (2x or 3x for the ultimate comfort. I like a lot of breathing room). The recommended size was 2x, and it fits true to size for me. I have had sensory issues with my back since my spinal surgery, and it is hard to find something that does not make me want to crawl of my skin. This to me is comfortable. It was worth the money I paid, however, it does seem quite delicate, so it is important to be mindful when putting it on and taking it off. ** It did come with pom poms in the front attached to the tassels. I cut them off and made it more my style. I also used a cover up because the dress is strappy and I have flabby arms. Lastly, the dress lining is thin, so light colored panties may be the best option. I am using this dress for a simple wedding ceremony and really pleased with my choice. Read more
items.author: hotmessmama

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wash and wear easy for summer traveling
items.body: Love this dress!! Good for warm weather. The Lacey feel is beautifully soft and washes well. I hang dry and looks amazing! Got compliments from friends and strangers so I recommend it is much a flattering fit. Read more
items.author: Christine Wachter

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Coachella Summer Dress Vibe
items.body: Looked as described. Fit well. I was disappointed that the little pom poms fell off in the dryer on the first wash. Cute look with cowboy boots as well. Read more
items.author: Elizabeth Doerrfeld

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars HIGHLY RECOMMEND! I love this dress so much
items.body: I purchased the CUPSHE Women's Sleeveless Summer Dress for our Key West trip, and it was a total hit! The flowy, lightweight fabric kept me cool and comfortable in the humid Florida heat, and the vibrant design screamed tropical chic. As someone with a 34DDD bust, I was thrilled that the dress provided enough support and coverage to wear without a bra, yet still felt secure and flattering. The fit was true to size, accentuating my curves without being too tight. It was perfect for casual beach strolls and dinners out. Easy to pack, wrinkle-resistant, and super versatile—this dress is a summer must-have! Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Renee

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not best quality, skirt liner is shorter in person.
items.body: 5'6 130lbs. I bought this in a S and a M and honestly could wear either. The S, the skirt liner looked a lot shorter and the chest area was fine, more snug than the M. In the photos, it looks like the skirt goes to the top of the knee. That model must be short. Look at some of the lower photos and you'll see the skirt is more like 2/3 of the way down the thigh. For a long dress, this liner is pretty short. My husband said he didn't like the dress on me in S but did in M, so M stayed. I echo other reviews, the lace below the bra line does not go all the way around and there is a bit of odd lace on the back of the dress that sticks out on both sides. This is just poor sewing or design. Also, the quality is not amazing for a $50 dress. It honestly doesn't merit that price for this quality. But the dress is lightweight and flowy and does look nice on. Read more
items.author: Flyer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Brown, Blue, Olive Green, Black, Dark Green, Mint Green, Pink, White, Beige, Yellow, Royal Blue, Rust Red, B-orange. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
